definition[1]: a plastic substance can be formed into many different shapes and keeps the shape it is formed into until someone changes it
definition[2]: something that is plastic looks or tastes artificial or not natural
example[3]: I hate that plastic smile of hers.
definition[3]: a light strong material that is produced by a chemical process, and which can be made into different shapes when it is soft
definition[4]: small plastic cards that are used to pay for things instead of money
example[6]: ‘I haven’t got any cash.’ ‘Don’t worry, I’ll stick it on the plastic  (=pay for it using a credit card).’
example[7]: Do they take plastic? (=can you pay using a credit card?)
definition[5]: a CREDIT CARD, or credit cards in general
example[8]: I’m going to have to pay for this with plastic.
